```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra) # for tables
library(magrittr)  # provides more pipe oeprators
library(dslabs)  # loads datasets
options(knitr.table.format = "latex")
```

```{r import data}
data(package = "dslabs")
data("research_funding_rates")
data <- as_tibble(research_funding_rates)
```

# Introduction
Data was acquired through the R package `dslabs` [@dslabs].

# Viewing Data
Just as an example. Will delete later.
```{r view data}
data %>% kable(format.args = list(trim = TRUE), booktabs = T) %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("striped", "scale_down")) %>% landscape()
```
